constraints.name: partition
constraints.description: 将所有元素分成两个子集，每个子集的特定属性（面朝上的硬币数量）必须相等
constraints.formal: ∃A, B ⊆ S, A ∩ B = ∅, A ∪ B = S, count_up(A) = count_up(B)

constraints.name: operation_sequence
constraints.description: 操作序列长度等于元素总数，且每个操作只能是四种预定义类型之一

constraints.name: invariance_under_permutation
constraints.description: 操作序列的有效性不依赖于被翻转的具体元素，即对于任意 k 个元素的翻转，操作序列都应保证胜利条件
constraints.formal: ∀k-subsets T of S, apply(ops, T) results in equal up-counts in both piles
